mapper.select: SELECT HS.SEQUENCE_ID sequenceId, HS.SEQUENCE_CODE sequenceCode, HS.SEQUENCE_NAME sequenceName, HS.COMPANY_FLAG companyFlag, HS.PROJECT_FLAG projectFlag, HS.PREFIX prefix, HS.DATE_FORMAT dateFormat, HS.FIGURE figure, HS.START_NUM startNum, HS.CURRENT_NUM currentNum, HS.CURRENT_PREFIX currentPrefix, HS.START_DATE_ACTIVE startDateActive, HS.END_DATE_ACTIVE endDateActive FROM HPMS_SEQUENCE HS WHERE HS.SEQUENCE_CODE = #{value} AND TRUNC(SYSDATE) BETWEEN HS.START_DATE_ACTIVE AND NVL(HS.END_DATE_ACTIVE,TRUNC(SYSDATE))
